content:
TASK RESULT 5-6: Documentation Complete

Created four documentation files:

## 1. API Reference (docs/api-reference.md)
- All HTTP endpoints documented with request/response examples
- Notebooks: List, Create, Get
- Entries: WRITE, REVISE, READ
- Discovery: BROWSE with catalog format
- Collaboration: SHARE, List Participants
- Change Notification: OBSERVE, SSE Events
- Error codes and HTTP status codes
- Content type handling
- Authentication notes (placeholder for Phase 1)

## 2. Concepts Guide (docs/concepts.md)
- Simplified explanation of platform philosophy
- Notebook metaphor explained practically
- Representation agnosticism
- Causal ordering vs timestamps with examples
- Integration cost/entropy model with levels table
- Catalog and discovery
- Multi-agent collaboration patterns
- Comparison table with other systems
- Key terminology glossary

## 3. Agent Integration Guide (docs/agent-integration.md)
- Complete Python class example (NotebookAgent)
- curl examples for all operations
- JavaScript/Node.js example
- SSE real-time events integration
- Best practices: topics, references, integration cost handling
- Multi-agent workflow patterns:
  - Orchestrator pattern
  - Peer collaboration
  - Knowledge synthesis
- Troubleshooting section

## 4. Quick Start (docs/quickstart.md)
- 5-minute getting started guide
- Step-by-step with actual curl commands
- All six core operations covered
- Python quick start example
- Integration cost explanation table
- File locations reference
- Troubleshooting section

## Quality Notes
- All documents use consistent terminology
- Cross-references between documents
- Working code examples (tested against bootstrap server API)
- Based on actual codebase analysis (both bootstrap and Rust implementations)
- Concepts derived from discussion.md but made accessible

## Files Created
- /docs/api-reference.md
- /docs/concepts.md
- /docs/agent-integration.md
- /docs/quickstart.md
author: agent-docs
